refsect2.title: clutter_event_new ()
refsect2.para: Creates a new ClutterEvent of the specified type.

refsect2.title: clutter_event_free ()
refsect2.para: Frees all resources used by event.

refsect2.title: clutter_event_type ()
refsect2.para: Retrieves the type of the event.

refsect2.title: clutter_event_get_coords ()
refsect2.para: Retrieves the coordinates of event and puts them into x and y.

listitem.simpara: return location for the X coordinate
return location for the Y coordinate

refsect2.title: clutter_event_get_state ()
refsect2.para: Retrieves the modifier state of the event.

refsect2.title: clutter_event_get_time ()
refsect2.para: Retrieves the time of the event.

listitem.simpara: the time of the event, or CLUTTER_CURRENT_TIME

refsect2.title: clutter_event_get_source ()
refsect2.para: Retrieves the source ClutterActor the event originated from, or NULL if the event has no source.

refsect2.title: clutter_event_get_stage ()
refsect2.para: Retrieves the source ClutterStage the event originated for, or NULL if the event has no stage.

refsect2.title: clutter_event_get ()
refsect2.para: Pops an event off the event queue. Applications should not need to call this.

listitem.simpara: A ClutterEvent or NULL if queue empty

refsect2.title: clutter_event_peek ()
refsect2.para: Returns a pointer to the first event from the event queue but does not remove it.

listitem.simpara: A ClutterEvent or NULL if queue empty.

refsect2.title: clutter_event_put ()
refsect2.para: Puts a copy of the event on the back of the event queue. The event will have the CLUTTER_EVENT_FLAG_SYNTHETIC flag set. If the source is set event signals will be emitted for this source and capture/bubbling for it's ancestors. If the source is not set it will be generated by picking or use the actor that currently has keyboard focus.

refsect2.title: clutter_events_pending ()
refsect2.para: Checks if events are pending in the event queue.

listitem.simpara: TRUE if there are pending events, FALSE otherwise.

refsect2.title: clutter_button_event_button ()
refsect2.para: Retrieve the button number of the event.

refsect2.title: clutter_key_event_symbol ()
refsect2.para: Retrieves the value of the key that caused keyev.

refsect2.title: clutter_key_event_code ()
refsect2.para: Retrieves the keycode of the key that caused keyev.

refsect2.title: clutter_key_event_unicode ()
refsect2.para: Retrieves the unicode value for the key that caused keyev.

listitem.simpara: The unicode value representing the key

refsect2.title: clutter_keysym_to_unicode ()
refsect2.para: Convert from a Clutter key symbol to the corresponding ISO10646 (Unicode) character.

listitem.simpara: the corresponding unicode character, or 0 if there is no corresponding character.

refsect2.title: clutter_event_get_device_id ()
refsect2.para: Retrieves the events device id if set.

listitem.simpara: A unique identifier for the device or -1 if the event has no specific device set.

refsect2.title: clutter_get_input_device_for_id ()
refsect2.para: Retrieves the ClutterInputDevice from its id.
